title: Lorewise, are summoners strictly Human/Humanoid?

embed.description: Find More Art Daily Deviations Critiques Critiqueable Wallpaper Random Random Deviant Random Deviation Random Group

body: Because I would like to be a Penguin.

replies.body: poro or human summoners used to be the rule, but an asteroid hit the institute of valoran and killed them all
Great, we can now replace them with reptiles and birds. Namely penguins.

SPOILER ALERT: THE PENGUINS ARE THE WATCHERS AND LISSANDRA WORKS FOR THEM. THEY WERE JEALOUS OF ANIVIA'S ABILITY TO FLY SO THEY MADE BLACK ICE TO CORRUPT HER SO SHE'LL HAND OVER HER FEATHERS TO USE IN GMO PENGUINS THAT CAN FLY
Lorewise, they are strictly formless beings, destroyed by the gods of Rito and removed from time.
